[h1]Remove Elements[/h1] We remove selected elements from the DOM using the [b]remove[/b]() method. For example: [b]HTML[/b]: [code format="html" ]

Red

Green

Blue

[/code] [b]JS[/b]: [code format="js" codeId="1124"]$("p").eq(1).[b]remove[/b]();[/code] This removes Green, the second paragraph element. You can also use the [b]remove[/b]() method on multiple selected elements, for example [b]$("p").remove()[/b] removes all paragraphs. [note]The jQuery remove() method removes the selected element(s), as well as its [b]child [/b]elements.[/note]
